name: Tetris (itch) (Aaron Bush)
description:
This is a Summer 2021 Project where I attempted to learn how to use Unity. I used C# and Visual Studio to create this project and to learn basic Unity skills such as Scene transitions, input systems, and minor animation.

  • The Left and Right arrow keys allow you to move the block in the corresponding direction. 
  • The Down arrow key will speed up the rate at which the block descends.
  • The Up arrow key will rotate the current block.
  • The H button will HOLD the current block, and will swap the previously held block with the current block.
  • The Space Bar will auto-drop the block to its lowest available position.
  • Escape will return to the Main Menu.
